list.title: Games for Cats
list.description: An interactive collection of sensory games designed for cats, featuring bug-smashing, movement tracking, and playful animations to keep pets engaged.

list.title: Baby Phone Games
list.description: A colorful and educational musical game for kids. Features piano instruments, nursery rhymes, and interactive sound experiences.

list.title: Sensispark Games
list.description: A satisfying collection of anti-stress and sensory fidget toys. Includes pop-its, slimes, and physics-based interactions for relaxation.
